properties:
Simplified Chinese language file for flowframtk
FlowframTk 简体中文语言包 王勇献 (wang_yongxian[at]hotmail[dot]com)
2008-08-08 updated for version 0.5b 2007-11-11 for JpgfDraw version 0.41b
{0} [<options>] [<file>] ...
{0} Enable debugging. {0} Enable experimental features.
Settings may be overridden by any JDR/AJR files that are loaded.
{0} Show the grid. {0} Enable grid lock. {0} Show the toolbars. {0} Show the status bar. {0} Show the rulers. {0} <type> Set the paper size to <type> where <type> may be a keyword, such as a0, or in the form: user <width> <height>. \meta'{'type'}' {0} Disable the request for printer attributes on startup.
新建(N) N control N
新建(N) control N New image Create a new image
最近打开的文件(R) R
图像描述(D)... D Set or edit the image''s description Provide a short textual description of the image
保存(S) S control S 保存图片
保存(S) control S Save the current image
另存为(A)... A Save image with file selector Save the current image to a named file
导出(E)... E Export image to another format Export the current image to a different format
Import... I Import from another format
Page Setup... G Setup the printer margins
Show Messages... M Open the message viewer
关闭(C) C Close the current image
Quit application
编辑(E) E
撤消(U) U Undo last action F8 undo
撤消 F8 Undo last action
重做(R) R Redo last undone action F9 redo
重做 F9 Redo last undone action
全选(A) A control A selectAll 选择所有对象
全选 control A selectAll
清除全选(D) D control shift A Deselect all objects
对象平移(M)... M F7 Move selected objects by specified offset
剪切(T) T control X 将所选对象剪切到剪贴板 cut
剪切 control X
复制(C) C control C 将所选对象复制到剪贴板 copy
复制 control C
粘贴(P) P control V 粘贴剪贴板中的对象 paste
粘贴 control V
对象描述(O)... O Set or edit the selected object''s description
Object Tag... J Set or edit the selected object''s tag
路径(P) H Change attributes for selected paths
编辑路径(E) E control I editPath false 编辑所选路径
编辑路径 control I
线条颜色(L)... L 设置线条颜色
线型(S) S 设置线条样式
所有线型(A)... A control Y Change all style attributes for selected paths
所有箭头(K)... K Set the same start, mid and end markers for selected paths
线条粗细(W)... W Set the pen width for selected paths
线条虚实(D)... D Set the line to solid or dash for selected paths
线头样式(C) C Set the line cap style for selected paths
平线头(B) B off Set the cap style to butt (flush) for selected paths
圆线头(R) R off Set the cap style to round for selected paths
方线头(S) S on Set the cap style to square (protrude) for selected paths
接头样式(J)... J Set the join style between segments for selected paths
始端箭头(S)... S Set the marker at the start of the path for selected paths
中间箭头(M)... M Set the marker at each interior vertex for selected paths
末端箭头(E)... E Set the marker at the end of the path for selected paths
区域内外绕行规则(W) W Set the winding rule for the selected paths
奇偶规则[奇内偶外](E) E on Set the winding rule to even-odd for selected paths
非零规则[非零为内](N) N off Set the winding rule to non-zero for selected paths
文本(X) X Change attributes for selected text areas
编辑文本(E)... E control shift I Edit selected text
文本颜色(C)... C 设置文本颜色
Outline O false Display text as an outline for selected text areas
Transformation Matrix... M Change the transformation matrix for the selected text area
字体(F) F 设置字体属性
所有样式(L)... L Change font attributes for the selected text areas
字体家族(Y)... Y 选择字体家族名称
字体大小(Z)... Z Change font size for the selected text areas
字体形状(H)... H Change font shape (upright/italic) for the selected text areas
字体系列(R)... R Change font series (medium/bold) for the selected text areas
Anchor A Change the horizontal or vertical anchors for the selected text areas
Both... B Change the horizontal and vertical LaTeX font anchors for the selected text areas
Horizontal... H Change the horizontal LaTeX font anchor for the selected text areas
Vertical... V Change the vertical LaTeX font anchor for the selected text areas
填充颜色(L)... L 设置填充颜色
Adjust Color J Adjust the color space for the selected shapes or text areas
Reduce to Gray Scale G Convert colors to grayscale for selected shapes or text areas
Convert to CMYK C Convert colors to CMYK for selected shapes or text areas
Convert to RGB R Convert colors to RGB for selected shapes or text areas
Convert to HSB H Convert colors to HSB for selected shapes or text areas
Fade Alpha F Adjust the transparency for selected shapes or text areas
Remove Translucency L Remove translucency for selected shapes or text areas
置于顶层(F) F control F movetofront 将所选择的对象放置于最顶(上)层
置于顶层 control F movetofront
置于底层(B) B control B movetoback 将所选择的对象放置于最底(下)层
置于底层 control B movetoback
Move Up V control shift F Move selected object(s) up the stack (z axis)
Move Down W control shift B Move selected object(s) down the stack (z axis)
变换(T) T
旋转(R)... R control W 旋转所选对象 rotate
旋转 control W
缩放 S control Z 对所选对象比例缩放 scale
缩放 control Z
倾斜(H)... H control H 对所选对象倾斜变形 shear
倾斜 control H
Reset Matrix A Reset the underlying transformation matrix
Distort D false Toggle distortion mode for selected path distort
Distort
路径反向(V) V Reverse the direction of the selected paths
将轮廓转换为路径(C) C control D Replace the selected object with a path that traces its outline
Convert To Full Path F Replace a composite shape with a normal path
合并路径(M) M control J Merge selected paths into a single path
Convert To Polygon... Y Convert curves in selected shape into a series of straight lines
Convert To Text Path N Replace the selected text area and path with a text-path textpath
To Text Path
Separate E Separate each selected compound shape into a group of regular paths
Path Union P
XOR Paths O
Subtract Paths T
Path Intersect I
将文本分解成单字(X) X Split each selected text area into a group of text areas Split each selected text area into a group of text areas consisting of the individual characters of the original.
组合(G) G control G 组合所选对象 group
组合 control G
取消组合(U) U control U 取消所选对象的组合 ungroup
取消组合 control U
Pattern A
Set Pattern... S pattern Apply a pattern to selected shape
Edit Pattern... E Edit the selected pattern's variables
Remove Pattern R Remove pattern attributes from selected shapes
对齐(J) J Justify the objects inside the group
左对齐(L) L Left justify the objects inside the group
水平居中(C) C Horizontally center the objects inside the group
右对齐(R) R Right justify the objects inside the group
顶端对齐(T) T Top-align the objects inside the group
垂直居中(M) M Vertically center the objects inside the group
底端对齐(B) B Bottom-align the objects inside the group
工具(O) O
选择对象(S) S control P select on
开放直线(L) L control L openline off
封闭直线(I) I control shift L closedline off
开放曲线(C) C control K opencurve off
封闭曲线(U) U control shift K closedcurve off
矩形(R) R control R rectangle off
椭圆(E) E control E ellipse off
文本(T) T control T textarea off
Math M control shift T math off
路径间断(G) G control M gap
取消路径(A) A shift ESCAPE Cancel current path abandon
完成路径(F) F ENTER finish
Create Path from SVG... V
对象导航(N) N
坐标定位(G)... G F5 Move mouse to specified co-ordinates
选定下一对象(S) S shift F5 Select the next object in the stack
增选下一对象(A) A shift F6 Add the next object in the stack to the current selection
跳选对象(K) K F6 Deselect the lowest selected object in the stack and add next object to selection
选择对象定位(F) F shift F7 Scroll to selected object(s)
根据描述查找对象(D)... D Select and scroll to an object from its description
根据描述增选对象(B)... B Scroll to an object from its description and add to current selection
位图(B) B
插入位图(I)... I Insert a reference to an external bitmap file
刷新(R) R Reload the bitmap from its referenced file
属性(P)... P Change the bitmap source file, the LaTeX path to the source file or the bitmap's transformation matrix
Vectorize... V Trace paths in the bitmap
TeX/LaTeX L
Preamble Editor M
文本区域形状(Parshape命令)... P
文本区域形状(Shapepar命令)... S
流动文本框(Flow Frames宏包) F
设定文本框(S)... S
清空文本框(C) C
设定Typeblock... T
Scale to Fit Typeblock K
显示页面(D)... P
样式(S)... S
显示标尺(R) R true
网格(G) G
显示网格(S) S F2 showgrid true
锁定网格(L) L shift F2 lockgrid false
网格设置(G)... G
纸张(P) P
Show Margins M
纵向(P) P
横向(P) L
A5 5
A4 4
A3 3
A2 2
A1 1
A0 0
Letter L
Legal G
Executive E
其它(O)... O
配置选项(C)... C
Configure TeX/LaTeX Settings... L
Configure User Interface... U
窗口(W) W
平铺(T) T
垂直排列(V) V
水平排列(H) H
全部最小化(M) M
全部最大化(X) X
Debug D
Write Log W control shift F11 Writes debugging information to a log file in the configuration directory
Dump All A control F11 Saves all open images to the configuration directory
Object Info... O shift F11 Display debugging information
Revalidate Image R F11 Updates all components and redraws the current image
Text Popup Menu
剪切(T) T control X
复制(C) C control C
粘贴(P) P control V
全选(A) A control A
插入符号(I)... I INSERT
Edit Path Popup Menu
添加控制点(A) A INSERT Add a new point in the middle of current segment
断开路径(B) B Split the path in two at the current segment
结束一条封闭路径(P) P
Close With Line L
Close With Curve C
Merge Ends M
Close Sub Path B
曲线平滑(U) U Adjust the curvature controls to ensure a continuous gradient between segments
Equidistant E Move control so the gradient vector has same direction and magnitude as adjoining segment
Relative R Move control so the gradient vector has same direction as adjoining segment
Anchor A false Enable the gradient continuity anchor
坐标(R)... R F7 Specify new co-ordinates for selected control point
转换为曲线段(C) C 将当前线段转换成一条曲线段
删除控制点(D) D DELETE 删除当前控制点
转换为直线段(L) L 将当前线段转换成一条直线段
转换为间断段(M) M 将当前线段转换成一条间断段
下一个控制点(N) N F6 选择下一个控制点
开始一条封闭路径(O) O
Remove Last Segment R
Keep Last Segment K
Previous Control V shift F6 Select the previous control point
对齐至网络线(S) S control shift S Move the selected control point to the closest tick mark
Path Symmetry Y
Has Symmetry H false Add or remove symmetry to the path
Anchor Join J false Constrain the end point to the line of symmetry
Anchor Start Control S Constrain the start point to the line of symmetry false
Segment Details... I
Distortion Popup Menu
Distort D false
Reset Transform R Reset distorted object''s transformation

取消绘制当前路径 在当前线段中点新产生一个控制点 全局设置相同的始端/中间/末端箭头样式 Automatically update anchors when aligning text areas Marker angle Select to compute gap between repeat markers according to the line width Select to automatically compute marker offset 按照路径梯度自动确定箭头方向(Orient marker to follow path's gradient) 箭头颜色取决于线条颜色 箭头颜色独立于线条颜色 允许使用两种箭头的组合 Distance between repeated markers Distance from vertex 允许将主要箭头与将要箭头相重叠 设置箭头类型 Arrow style markers Bracket style markers Cap style markers Data point style markers Decorative markers Partial arrow markers 在线段终点将路径拆分断开 用一条新线段封闭当前路径 Close path with a line Close path with a continuous curve Close path by merging end point with start point 封闭的三次B样条曲线工具 封闭的直线段工具 使线段在接头处连续化 (relative shift) 使线段在接头处连续化 (equidistant controls) Toggle continuity anchor 将当前线段转换成一条曲线段 将当前线段转换成一条直线段 将当前线段转换成一条间断段 Set the co-ordinates using a dialogue box CMYK (Cyan Magenta Yellow Key) 模式的颜色选择 删除当前控制点 Northward North-Westward Westward South-Westward Southward South-Eastward Eastward North-Eastward North starting location North-West starting location West starting location South-West starting location South starting location South-East starting location East starting location North-East starting location Central starting location 允许/禁止鼠标拖动缩放 Control point settings 指定启动时的设置 椭圆工具 完成当前路径绘制 在当前路径中设定一个间断(gap) Gray selector Rectangular grid (origin at top left) Radial grid (origin at center of canvas) Isometric grid (origin at top left) Tschichold grid (origin at top left) Path-based grid (origin at top left) 显示/隐藏网格线 HSB (Hue Saturation Brightness) color selector 保存或使用JDR文件中保存的画布设置 LaTeX中等价的字体家族 LaTeX中等价的字体系列 LaTeX中等价的字体形状 LaTeX中等价的字体大小 设置线条样式 锁定网格线 Create a text area that will automatically insert math shift characters at the start and end of the LaTeX alternative text 新建图片 选择下一个控制点 Set normalization factors 打开图片 开放的三次B样条曲线工具 开放的直线段工具 除去最后一条线段以形成开放路径 Open path removing last segment Open path keeping last segment Select the previous control point 矩形工具 更改渲染设置 RGB (Red Green Blue) 模式颜色选择 选择工具 选择所有对象 Move the control to the nearest grid point 设置启动目录 Black Dark Gray Gray Light Gray White Dark Blue Blue Cyan Green Dark Green Yellow Goldenrod Orange Tan RawSienna Red Dark Red Orchid Magenta Pink Teal Brown Lime Toggle whether the start point of the underlying path should be anchored Add or remove symmetry from the path Toggle whether the last point of the underlying path should be anchored 文本工具 Block scroll down Block scroll up Scroll down to end Scroll up to start Scroll down Scroll up Block scroll left Block scroll right Scroll left to start Scroll right to end Scroll left Scroll right
增加控制点 Set anchor Anchor control 位图属性 断开路径 清除流动文本框 结束一条封闭路径 Close Sub Path 更改颜色 曲线平滑 转换为曲线段 转换为直接段 转换为间断段 转换为路径 Convert to Text Path Convert to Pattern Convert to Polygon Start Distortion Distortion 关闭子窗口 删除 删除控制点 取消选择 取消全选 取消选择子窗口 设置显示页面 完成编辑 Edit Pattern 开始编辑 编辑文本 更改填充颜色 设定流动文本框 Set Normal Size Set Document Class Split Text 完成新的文本区域 更改字体 组合 Set halign 最小化子窗口 对齐 底端对齐 水平居中 左对齐 垂直居中 顶端对齐 右对齐 Set LaTeX font size 更改线条颜色 更改线条样式 合并路径 移动 移动控制点 置于底层 置于顶层 Move Up To Index {0} Move Down To Index {0} 新建位图 新建曲线 新建椭圆 新建直线 新建对象 新建矩形 新建文本 开始一条封闭路径 粘贴 Path Intersect Path Union Remove Pattern Reset Distortion Reset Text Matrix Reset Bitmap Matrix 路径反向 旋转 缩放 水平缩放 垂直缩放 选择子窗口 Separate flowframe pages setting Edit Preamble Set Description Set Tag 设定当前选项 Set Transformation 设定 Typeblock 倾斜 选择 全选 选择控制点 更改工具 开始新的文本区域 Subtract Paths Symmetry Symmetry Join Anchor Symmetry Close Anchor Set Text Outline Mode 取消组合 Set valign XOR Paths Vectorize bitmap Set Storage Unit Drag and Drop New Path 撤消 {0} 重做 {0}
Information Double-click to view full message
帮助 control F1 View the relevant page of the manual
单击产生节点. 在最后节点上双击可结束路径. Drag corner points to distort object. 单击控制点可选择线段. 单击产生中心点, 移动鼠标并单击完成绘制. Grid lock on Grid lock off 已被更改 Image has been modified Image hasn't been modified Storage unit 点击"新建图片"按键或从菜单 文件->新建 开始 要恢复文本框, 请在其图标上单击 单击产生节点. 在最后节点上双击可结束路径. 单击产生第一个角控制点, 移动鼠标并单击形成对角控制点完成绘制. 单击选择对象. Ctrl+单击增选对象. 双击选择底层对象. 单击产生文本区域. 单击产生文本区域.
位图属性 LaTeX 文档中图片路径 P
Auto A
LaTeX 命令 L
Transformation Matrix T
JDR/AJR versions 1.8 and above can now store the bitmap location either as an absolute path or a path relative to the saved file.
Your current application settings will use the path as specified in the ''{0}'' box.
Your current application settings will use a relative path.

Reset R reload
Flatness: {0} Size: {0} XOR area: {0} {1}² Perimeter length: {0} {1} Polygon area: {0} {1}² Shape is already a polygon. Are you sure you want to discard the polygon?
Create Path from SVG
Create Path Create Path dotask
Unit: Unit:
Enter the path data (as per the SVG path "d" property) in the box below. For example: M 100 100 L 300 400. Select the unit of measurement and click on the {0} button to create a draft path. (The current styles will be added to the path when it''s added to the canvas.) The unit should correspond to the SVG data. The co-ordinates will be converted to the current storage unit while the SVG data is parsed. If the data source uses right handed co-ordinates (y increases upwards) they will be converted to the left-handed system (y increases downwards) used by the canvas. You will need to reparse the SVG data to make the change in unit take effect. Are you sure you want to abandon the changes you have made to the SVG data? Discard the edits made to the SVG data? Select ''Yes'' to add the current working path to the canvas.
Data Co-ordinate System
Left-handed L Origin top left with y increasing downwards off
Right-handed G Origin bottom left with y increasing upwards on
Path description: D Path Created From SVG

Set Storage Unit
Storage Unit: U If you change the storage unit, all coordinates in the current frame will be converted to the new storage unit. This may take a while if you have a large or complex image, so it's generally best to set the storage unit before you start your image. The storage unit is independent of the grid unit. Some settings, such as line width or font size, are independent of the storage unit.

Normalization M Due to the varied nature of display units, 1 inch (or 72 PostScript points) displayed on the screen at 100% magnification may not actually measure 1 inch if you hold a ruler up to your screen. You can compensate for this by setting the horizontal and vertical normalization factors. If you already know these factors you can type them into the boxes below (or set them both to 1 to remove normalization): or you can hold your ruler up against the unnormalized horizontal and vertical lines, enter their measurements in the boxes and click on the 'Compute' buttons below. X Normalize Factor: N Y Normalize Factor: Y Compute X Norm P Compute Y Norm T Reset E Unnormalized Horizontal Unnormalized Vertical Invalid length ''{0}'' Normalized Lines

Typeblock
Commands such as \newflowframe, \newstaticframe and \newdynamicframe all require locations relative to the typeblock (the area defined by the margins and \textwidth/\hsize and \textheight/\vsize). This area needs to be defined in order to convert the canvas coordinates into suitable values for the flowfram.sty commands. You won''t be able to define any flowframe data until this area is set.
Compute Margins From Selected Path P Even Page Shift E The even page shift is used to calculate the even margin for two-sided documents. You can use the Compute button to calculate the required shift to create a symmetric layout. Line Detection Delta Threshold: D Merge Spike Length Threshold: Merge Spike Neighbor Threshold: Fixed line width: Set line width to the given value Relative line width Set line width to twice the average delta round round to nearest positive integer Detect intersections Variance Threshold: V Wedge Threshold: W Wedge Length Threshold: Spike Return Distance: K Minimum stub length: B Tiny Step Threshold: Y
Smooth Shapes Tiny Step Threshold: T Smoothing will try to replace a sequence of segments with a longer segment. The tiny step threshold indicates the upper bound for the length of each segment in the sequence.The sequence will stop either when a segment is found that is too long or if a third bend (maximum/minimum) is detected. Points of inflection aren't detected. Longer segments may be replaced if the entire sub-path can be approximated by a quadrilateral or ellipse. Length Threshold: L Length Threshold and Threshold Diff: If the best line is shorter than the Length Threshold, then the best line longer than this length will be selected if the delta (deviation) for the longer line is less than the delta for the shorter line plus the Threshold Diff value. Threshold Diff: D Max Deviation: X
If a path has delta (deviation) that's larger than Max Deviation, it won't be used. The deviation is calculated as ��/�� where �� is the number of points in the sequence and �� is the area of �� XOR �� = (�� ∪ ��) ∖ (�� ∩ ��) where �� is the shape formed by closing the polygonal sequence and �� is the shape formed by closing the fitted curve/line. Deviation Diff: If bends (maxima/minima) are detected, then an attempt will be made to fit lines joining the sequence start to the mid point of the bends and to the end of the sequence. If the average delta (deviation) for line fits using bends as end points is ≤ best delta + Deviation Diff, then these lines will be chosen. Try Bézier curves In addition to trying to fit lines to the sequence of tiny segments, if the ‘Try Bézier curves’ check box is selected, the smoothing task will also try fitting cubic Bézier segments. The Nelder-Mead method is used to find the best fit. Curve Sampling It can take a long time to try fitting a curve to every sub-sequence. Sampling can significantly reduce the time taken but it may not find the best match. Flatness Threshold: If a curve is too flat, the best line will be chosen instead. The flatness is the maximum distance of a control point from the line connecting the end points. Threshold Diff: If both a possible line and curve have been found (that satisfy other criteria), the curve will be chosen if the curve delta is less than the line delta plus the Threshold Diff, otherwise the line will be chosen. Minimum points: P Curve fitting will only be attempted if the sequence of tiny segments has at least Minimum Points. Stationary Point Threshold: If the best curve doesn't fit any detected bends (maxima/minima) then a longer curve that fits one or both bends will be chosen where the bend deviation is less than this value, provided other restrictions are satisfied (such as flatness and maximum deviation). Note that points of inflection aren't detected. Nelder-Mead Simplex Parameters Alpha (�� > 0): Reflection co-efficient Gamma (�� > 1): Expansion co-efficient Rho (0 < �� ≤ 0.5): Contraction co-efficient Sigma (0 < �� < 1): Shrink co-efficient Epsilon (�� > 0): Termination threshold Maximum iterations (> 0): Stopping criteria to prevent process running on for too long.

Welcome <h1>Welcome to {0} version {1}.</h1> Here are a few pointers:<ul><li>Use SHIFT ESC to abandon a path under construction<br>(This has changed from JpgfDraw.)</li><li>Use the {2} dialog to set the storage unit.<br>({3}->{4})</li><li>Use the {5} dialog to enable/disable hotspots.<br>({6}->{7})</li><li>The export to PDF function uses LaTeX, so you need to have TeX installed to use it.</li><li>The export to PS/SVG functions now need to be enabled if they are required.</li><li>Make sure you have at least version 1.16 (preferably at least v2.0) of flowfram.sty if you want to use the export to .cls or .sty functions.</li><li>The preamble editor is now in a pane attached to the side of the canvas.</li><li>If your operating system supports drag and drop, you can drag image files onto {0}''s internal desktop (the gray background of the main window) to open the images in separate windows or you can drag and drop onto the canvas (in select mode only) to add the file contents to the current image. You can also drag and drop text onto the canvas in select mode or in text or maths mode.</li></ul>See the manual for further details.
